nodes.beat: Red, a young girl living in Ancient Rome, receives a message from her sick grandmother via carrier pigeon.
Grandmother requests Red to bring her some medicinal herbs from the marketplace.
Red, wearing her red cloak, ventures out with her trusted horse.
En route, Red encounters a stranger, a cunning thief, who learns about her mission.
The thief misleads Red to a deserted gladiator arena.
Realizing the trick, Red uses her knowledge of the city to find her way back.
Red exposes the thief to the city's guards and continues her journey to her grandmother's house.
Red delivers the herbs and they enjoy a meal together.
Grandmother asks Red to bring her a special amulet from the temple.
The thief attempts to steal the amulet from Red.
Red, noticing the theft, seeks help from a group of passing soldiers.
Together, they catch the thief and retrieve the amulet.
Red delivers the amulet to her grandmother.
Red, a skilled horse rider, plans a race to visit her grandmother.
Red's race attracts the attention of a jealous rival.
The rival tries to sabotage Red's race by setting traps.
The rival tries to mislead Red's horse by scattering feed on a different path.
Red, noticing the diversion, uses her skills to steer her horse on the right path.
Red's supporters, united, report the rival leading to his disqualification.
Grandmother asks Red to bring her a special scroll from the library.
The thief tries to replace the scroll with a fake one.
Red, noticing the difference, realizes the trick.
Red, with the help of the librarian, exposes the thief.
Red delivers the correct scroll to her grandmother.
Grandmother asks Red to bring her some exotic fruits from the market.
The thief tries to steal Red's money pouch.
Red, noticing the theft, chases the thief and retrieves her money.
Red buys the fruits and delivers them to her grandmother.
The rival tries to sabotage Red's race by scaring her horse.
Red, being an experienced rider, calms her horse and continues the race.
Red's supporters report the rival leading to his disqualification.
The rival tries to distract Red's horse by waving a red cloth.
Red, noticing the distraction, steers her horse away from the rival.
Red's supporters, united, report the rival leading to his disqualification.
